meanings.definition: To travel beyond or surpass in distance.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys outtraveling to new places every summer.
meanings.sent2: The explorer is outtraveling to remote islands for his research expedition.
meanings.sent3: The snail was outtraveling at a speed that made the tortoise laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination outtravels reality when she dreams of far-off lands.
meanings.sent5: The rocket outtraveled all expectations, reaching the stars in record time.

meanings.definition: The act of traveling beyond or surpassing in distance.
meanings.sent1: His outtraveling brought him to many countries around the world.
meanings.sent2: The outtraveling of the migratory birds is a marvel of nature.
meanings.sent3: The outtraveling of the marathon runner made the spectators cheer.
meanings.sent4: The outtraveling of time is a concept explored in science fiction.
meanings.sent5: The outtraveling of the comet was visible from Earth with a telescope.
